description.en:
If your company pays for you to attend, or if you use Python professionally. When you purchase a Business Ticket, you help us keep the conference affordable for everyone. 
Thank you!

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (16-20 July). Tutorials (14-15 July) are **NOT** included. To access Tutorial days please buy a Tutorial or Combined ticket.

**Net price €500.00 + 21% Czech VAT**.  

Available until sold out or 27 June.

Access to Workshop/Tutorial Days (14-15 July) and the Sprint Weekend (19-20 July), but **NOT** the main conference (16-18 July). 
**Net price €400.00+ 21% Czech VAT.**

Tutorial tickets are only available until 27 June

Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (14-20 July).
**Net price €800.00 + 21% Czech VAT.**

Available until sold out or 27 June.

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (16-20 July) & limited access to specific sponsored/special workshops during the Workshop/Tutorial Days (14-15 July).
**Net price €750.00 + 21% Czech VAT**

Available from 27 June or after regular Conference tickets are sold out.

Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (14-20 July).
**Net price €1,200.00 + 21% Czech VAT.**

Available from 27 June or after regular Combined tickets are sold out.
If you enjoy Python as a hobbyist or use it as a freelancer.

To access Tutorial days please buy a Tutorial or Combined ticket.

Available until sold out or 27 June.

Access to everything during the whole seven-day event (14-20 July).

Available until sold out or 27 June.

Access to Conference Days & Sprint Weekend (16-20 July). Tutorials (14-15 July) are NOT included. To access Tutorial days please buy a Tutorial or Combined ticket.

Available from 27 June or after regular Conference tickets are sold out.
